name: IDN Financials
description: IDN Financials is a Video and Technological Platform dedicated to the Indonesia Stock Exchange. The platform partners with leading data providers, news outlets, and companies to curate and process high-quality financial information for its audience.
mission: To better educate and inform the Indonesian public and regional investors about the Indonesian stock market, while promoting and pushing for greater transparency within the country's financial industry.
vision: To become the premier destination for local and regional investors seeking the latest news and detailed information about Indonesian public companies.
